short_summary: Seasonal lighting services on Granville Island
description: The contract will have a term of 5 years and a value of up to $150,000 per year. A mandatory site visit will be held on April 15, 2024 at 11:00 a.m. PDT.

cultivé-Construction for Seasonal Lighting Services on Granville Island{.title-underline}

## RFP (Request for Proposal)
### Background
*   Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for the Seasonal Lighting Services on Granville Island, Vancouver, British Columbia.

### Contract Details

*   **Contract Term:** Five (5) years
*   **Estimated Value:** Up to $750,000 CAD (before taxes) over the term
*   **Renewal Options:** None specified

### Technical Requirements

*   **Scope of Work**: The selected contractor will provide seasonal lighting services on Granville Island, including installation, maintenance, and removal of lights.
*   **Location**: The work will be carried out on Granville Island, Vancouver, British Columbia.

### Contact Information

*   **Point of Contact:** Tim Webster
*   **Email:** [tjwebste@cmhc-schl.gc.ca](mailto:tjwebste@cmhc-schl.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** (613) 748-5680
*   **Office Location:** 700 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario

### Additional Information
*   A mandatory site visit will take place on April 15, 2024, at 11:00 a.m. Pacific Daylight Time.
*   Suppliers must download the solicitation document and attachments directly from the tender page.
*   CMHC will not distribute solicitation documents posted on canadabuys.canada.ca.

### Procurement Status
*   The tender is currently expired.

### CVS Classification
*   72151501 - Lighting installation services
*   Services d’installation d’appareils d’éclairage

### Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) 
*   Applies

### Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) 
*   Applies

### Currency
*   CAD (Canadian dollars)
